definition: One key opens one lock./There is a different solution for each problem. (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 ba3 yao4 shi5 kai1 yi1 ba3 suo3

definition: Today is the key to the past.
pinyin: xian4 zai4 shi4 guo4 qu5 yao4 shi5

sentences.english: Vernet glanced at the key but made no move to touch it.
sentences.chinese: 韦尔内看了一眼那把钥匙，却没有去动它。

sentences.english: She get left her key in the office or get to toce the gate open.
sentences.chinese: 她把钥匙忘在了办公室，只好强行把门打开。

sentences.english: Depend on intuition and experience, he ases if the key that found baseball of the gold dollar that defeat solution.
sentences.chinese: 凭借直觉和经验，他仿佛找到了破解金元棒球的钥匙。

sentences.english: This key is one use only IIRC.
sentences.chinese: 简单的说，钥匙只能用一次。

sentences.english: The key won't move, it need oiling .
sentences.chinese: 钥匙转不动了，它需要上油了。

sentences.english: Leave the key in the lock.
This, I believe, is the key to living a happy life.
sentences.chinese: 这，就是我所坚信的，打开生活中快乐之门的钥匙。
你可以配一枚新钥匙吗？

sentences.english: Someone was opening the front door with a latchkey.
sentences.chinese: 有人在用门锁钥匙开前门。

sentences.english: First we got a bottle hooked to a key-chain.
sentences.chinese: 我们用钥匙链和瓶子串在一起。

sentences.english: The boy will bring you the keys at the door.
sentences.chinese: 茶房会在门口把钥匙交给你的。

sentences.english: Then proceed to the boiler, deal with the trap, and obtain another dull gray key.
sentences.chinese: 随后走到锅炉处，解除陷阱，取得另一枚尘灰色钥匙。

sentences.english: Love is a master key which opens the gate of happiness. (Oliver Wedell Holms)
sentences.chinese: 爱是打开快乐之门的万能钥匙。

sentences.english: A: The boy will take your key and show you to your room.
sentences.chinese: 行李生将拿这钥匙把您领到房间去。

sentences.english: They have your passkey number embedded in them.
sentences.chinese: 他们使你的总钥匙数字在他们里面埋入。

sentences.english: All that afternoon I looked for my keys.
sentences.chinese: 整个下午我都在找钥匙。

definition: to open a door (lit. and fig.)/to open for business
locked in (with the door locked from the outside)
to stand as a goalkeeper/to keep guard on a gate
